entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
